series_description: This series documents referrals from hospital staff that identifies Medicaid recipients who are using Emergency Room (ER) Services inappropriately. Recipients may be evaluated for enrollment in the Client Medical Management Program to reduce ER use.
retention_statement: Retain in agency 1 year, then transfer records to the Records Center, Library of Virginia. Retain in Records Center 2 years. Total retention 3 years, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the reporting and tracking of Medicaid recipients who have been identified as using ER Services inappropriately.
retention_statement: Retain entry for 3 years after last activity, then delete from database.
